ANotepad
Version: Beta 1.0
Developed by Viyu
E-Mail: appdev_viyu@qq.com
Your suggestions and bug reports are welcome!

 User Guide:

 Create a note: In main UI, press the icon in bottom to create a new note.

 Save: In editing panel, press back button or the left arrow icon in top-left to save note. If the home button is pressed directly, the content will be saved automatically.

 Change the font color: Press the first icon in top-right to change font color. The color will be saved and displayed in note list.

 Set alarm: Press the second icon in top-right to set alarm.

 Draw line: Press the third icon in top-right to or not to draw line.

 Delete: Long press a note in note list to open functions menu. Then press 'Delete' to delete note directly.

 Send as SMS: Long press a note in note list to open functions menu. Then press 'Send as SMS' to send note as SMS.
